name: Curse of Exhaustion
originalText:
Enchant player
Enchanted player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

rulings.text: Curse of Exhaustion will look at the entire turn to see if the enchanted player has cast a spell yet that turn, even if Curse of Exhaustion wasn’t on the battlefield when that spell was cast.
